item.title: Call Sign Chaos
item.description: Overview Call Sign Chaos reflects on Jim Mattis’s near 4 decades of experience in service to our country. The book is divided into 3 parts: direct leadership, executive leadership, and strategic leadership. Jim Mattis recalls his lessons learned from Vietnam, Dessert Storm, Afghanistan, Iraq, NATO, Joint Forces Command, CENTCOM, and US Secretary of Defense. I wanted to compile a list of quotes from this book that stood out to me.
